name: Star Knight (itch)
description:
On a small under developed planet in 4057 A.D. it was just a normal day for Garret and his friends. Then suddenly a ship from another planet harvesting Star Crystals attacks the planet. A mysterious man shows up to help them with the ability to teleport onto the ship. They are told there are four holograph decks they need to deactivate to reach the main area and stop the person in charge.
